#Text= Zuko says : " We do n't need any more useless things !

column1: #Text=You forget , we have to carry everything ourselves now !
#Text=" Azula says : " Hello , brother .
#Text=Uncle .
#Text=" Zuko says : " What are you doing here ?
#Text=" Azula says : " In my country , we exchange a pleasant hello before asking questions .
#Text=Have you become uncivilized so soon , Zuzu ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Do n't call me that !
#Text=" Iroh says : " To what do we owe this honor ?
#Text=" Azula says : " Hmmm ... must be a family trait .
#Text=Both of you so quick to get to the point .
#Text=I 've come with a message from home .
#Text=Father 's changed his mind .
#Text=Family is suddenly very important to him .
#Text=He 's heard rumors of plans to overthrow him ; treacherous plots .
#Text=Family are the only ones you can really trust .
#Text=Father regrets your banishment .
#Text=He wants you home .
#Text=Did you hear me ?
#Text=You should be happy .
#Text=Excited .
#Text=Grateful .
#Text=I just gave you great news .
#Text=" Iroh says : " I 'm sure your brother simply needs a moment .
#Text=" Azula says : " Do n't interrupt , Uncle !
#Text=I still have n't heard my thank you .
#Text=I 'm not a messenger .
#Text=I did n't have to come all this way .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Father regrets ?
#Text=He ... wants me back ?
#Text=" Azula says : " I can see you need time to take this in .
#Text=I 'll come to call on you tomorrow .
#Text=Good evening .
#Text=" Katara says : " Can we talk about something ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Sure .
#Text=" Katara says : " Do you remember when we were at the air temple and you found Monk Gyatso 's skeleton ?
#Text=It must have been so horrible and traumatic for you .
#Text=I saw you get so upset that you were n't even you anymore .

#Text=I 'm not saying the Avatar State does n't have incredible and helpful power ... but you have to understand ... for the people who love you , watching you be in that much rage and pain is really scary .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm really glad you told me that .
#Text=But I still need to do this .
#Text=" Katara says : " I do n't understand .
#Text=" Aang says : " No , you do n't .
#Text=Every day , more and more people die .
#Text=I 'm already one hundred years late .
#Text=Defeating the Fire Lord is the only way to stop this war .
#Text=I have to try it !
#Text=" Katara says : " I ca n't watch you do this to yourself .
#Text=I 'm not coming tomorrow .
#Text=Good night .
#Text=" Aang says : " Good night .
#Text="
